title: @Targons Blade - Help exchaning my account to Brazil
body:
Hello!

Some days ago [5 to be exact] i opened a ticket asking for help to change my account from NA to Brazil, as im in Brazil now and i can't use my card to buy RP on NA. I can only buy it in Brazil for my Brazilian account.

I don't know why i still didn't get a reply but maybe you could look in to it for me?  Thanks :)

replies.body: Would be a bit unfair to get a free transfer. :P

We're pretty slammed with tickets at the moment, so while you will get a response, it will be at a delay which is abnormal. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
